entry.title: hmake98/rmq-board: A modern, intuitive and lightweight admin UI for RabbitMQ with real-time monitoring, message inspection, and publishing capabilities. Features dark mode, responsive design, direct AMQP connection, and a user-friendly dashboard for effortless queue management and debugging.
